mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID as userId, U.USER_NM as userNm, U.USER_DT_CD as userDtCd, U.USE_YN as useYN, U.USE_PWD as userPwd, U.ST_DT as StDt, U.ED_DT as EdDt, U.PRT_CD as PrtCd, U.PWD_UPD_DT as PwdUpdDt, U.FST_REG_DT as FstRegDt, U.FST_USER_ID as FstUserId, U.LST_UPD_DT as LstUpdCd, U.LST_UPD_ID as LstUpdId, P.PRT_NM as PrtNm FROM MA_USER_MT U LEFT JOIN MA_PRT_MT P ON (U.PRT_CD=P.PRT_CD) WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND USE_PWD=#{userPwd} AND USE_YN='Y'
